title: Wall Street Breakfast: The Week Ahead
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Apple (AAPL) enthusiasts are preparing for a possible iphone 14 drop this week, with a special new tech for night photography. The NFL season kicks off, and football fans are getting ready to bet on their favorite teams, putting a spotlight on the casino sector. Global sales of industrial robots and factory automation is up, as the U.S. deals with harsh labor shortages.
